about.title: About Us
about.description: Hengyu Technology Co., Ltd. is an enterprise engaged in chemical additives, production and sales. We focus on modified siloxane and formulation technology, with strong R&D capabilities in formulations, able to quickly respond to sample analysis needs with efficient testing and precise solution feedback. Our production lines cover defoamers, glass fiber/carbon fiber sizing agents, release agents, agricultural extenders and other additives. The factory is equipped with advanced production equipment and strict quality control systems to ensure high quality and stability of products. In addition, we also focus on environmental protection and safe production, comply with relevant regulations and standards, and ensure the sustainability and safety of the production process.
about.companyOverviewDesc: Hengyu Technology Co., Ltd. is an enterprise specializing in the research, development, production and sales of silicone chemicals, with thirty years of silicone industry experience and formulation technology.
about.productionLinesDesc: Production lines cover silicone defoamers, glass fiber additives, die-casting release agents, agricultural silicone extenders and other additives.
about.qualityControlDesc: The factory is equipped with advanced production equipment and strict quality control systems to ensure high quality and stability of products.
about.safetyDesc: We also focus on environmental protection and safe production, comply with relevant regulations and standards, and ensure the sustainability and safety of the production process.

features.experienceDesc: Over 30 years of industry experience, deeply understanding customer needs

options.label: Oilfield Foam Solution, Improve Efficiency and Protect Equipment

oilfieldSolution.title: Oilfield Foam Solution, Improve Efficiency and Protect Equipment
oilfieldSolution.description: Professional oilfield foam control solutions that effectively address foam issues in drilling, extraction, and refining processes, improving production efficiency and protecting critical equipment.
oilfieldSolution.introduction: In oilfield operations, foam formation presents significant challenges that can impact extraction efficiency, equipment integrity, and environmental safety. Understanding the causes, consequences, and solutions for foam generation in oil extraction is crucial for optimizing petroleum production processes.

causes.title: Causes of Foam Formation in Oilfields
causes.description: Foam in oilfields typically forms due to gas release during extraction processes or as a byproduct of enhanced recovery techniques:
items: High Reservoir Pressure: When extracting oil under high pressure, dissolved gases in crude oil are released as it rises to the surface. This gas separation leads to foam formation.
Gas Injection Methods: Injecting natural gas into reservoirs to increase production can mix with existing gases in crude oil, creating stable foam.
Chemical Reactions: The use of surfactants, acids, or other additives can alter the interfacial tension between oil and water, promoting foam generation.
Geological Conditions: Reservoir characteristics such as small rock pores, impurities in crude oil, or proximity to gas pockets can exacerbate foam formation.

consequences.title: Consequences of Foam Formation in Oil Production
consequences.description: Foam-related issues can severely hinder oilfield operations in multiple ways:
items: Increased Viscosity: Foam increases the viscosity of extraction fluids, reducing flow rates and overall production efficiency.
Pressure Surges: Excessive foam accumulation can cause pressure imbalances that may lead to mechanical damage to extraction equipment.
Equipment Damage: Prolonged exposure to foam-related stress can result in equipment failure or downtime.
Environmental Hazards: Uncontrolled foam may escape into surface water or nearby environments, posing contamination risks and regulatory challenges.

solutions.title: Role of Advanced Defoamers in Oilfield Operations
solutions.description: To address these challenges, we provide a range of specialized oilfield defoamers designed to effectively solve foam problems. These advanced formulations offer:
items: Rapid Foam Elimination: Effectively targets and collapses stubborn micro-scale foam.
Foam Suppression: Prevents foam reformation, ensuring smooth operation throughout the extraction cycle.
Gas Release Promotion: Achieves effective gas separation to stabilize pressure and enhance flow dynamics.
Durability: Maintains performance under extreme conditions, including the high salinity, temperature, and pressure typical of oilfield environments.

benefits.title: Benefits of Using Hengyu Oilfield Defoamers
benefits.description: By integrating defoamer solutions into oilfield workflows, operators can expect:
items: Improved Efficiency: Enhanced fluid dynamics and reduced viscosity to optimize extraction rates.
Extended Equipment Lifespan: Minimized pressure shocks and mechanical wear, reducing maintenance costs and downtime.
Environmental Compliance: Limited foam emissions protect ecosystems and meet strict environmental regulations.
benefits.conclusion: Our defoamers undergo rigorous testing to ensure they meet the complex demands of modern oilfield operations, providing customizable solutions for various extraction challenges.

featuredProduct.title: HY-611 Silicone Defoamer
featuredProduct.description: High-performance, alkali-stable silicone defoamer emulsion with 30% active content
features: Optimized for surfactant-rich formulations and environments
Significant foam control performance with minimal impact on transparency
Recommended for process environments with high pH and chemical load
applications: Petroleum Industry: drilling, extraction, and refining processes
Paper Industry: pulp black liquor treatment, papermaking process, wastewater treatment
Food Industry: production of amino acids (e.g., MSG) and organic acids (e.g., citric acid), soy products, etc.
Industrial Cleaning: machining, circuit boards, beer bottles, and other cleaning scenarios
Chemical Production: latex production and PVC production
Coating Industry: production and application processes for latex paint, paint, ink, etc.
featuredProduct.advantages: When formulated into detergents and textile auxiliaries, HY-611 silicone defoamer exhibits significant foam control performance, with minimal impact on transparency, making it an ideal choice for industrial applications.
